useCase.name: Search for Data Packages

preconditions.precondition: The Consumer has entered a search query.

successEndConditions.condition: The search results are displayed to the Consumer.

useCase.trigger: The Consumer initiates a search for data packages.

mainSequence.step: Search Interface sends the search request to Platform Backend.
Platform Backend queries the Data Registry for data packages.
Data Registry returns the search results to Platform Backend.
Platform Backend displays the search results.
Search Interface shows the search results to the Consumer.
